attributes.action: Allow shops to open without restrictions on Sunday but with worker protections
attributes.additional_details: This would increase freedom and choice for all but should particularly help during COVID-19 economic recovery.
attributes.background: Allow all shops and other consumer businesses to open on Sundays without restrictions but add legislation to allow workers to opt-out of Sunday working without being disadvantaged in any way.

rejection.details:
Workers are already able to opt out of Sunday working and cannot be discriminated against if they do so. You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/sunday-working

You could start a petition calling for the removal of restrictions on Sunday opening times, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
